Html:
Hi,

I'm trying to use the ModuleDownloadProgressChanged event to track module download? The event gets fired at appropriate intervals but the TotalBytesToReceive is always equal to BytesReceived. So percentage is always 100% !!! 

Am I missing something here or is it a bug?

Hi Ganesh,

There are no known issues in the Prism Library that could cause that behavior in the ModuleDownloadProgressChanged event. You find an example of the aforementioned event being used in the ModuleTracker class in the Modularity Quickstart.

If you continue experiencing issues regarding this, it would be useful for us to have a repro sample or additional details about the way you're using the event, so that we can help you solve them.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi

Hi Guido,

Apparently the xap was downloading very fast on my end so the total was same as byteseceived. :)
